profile.name: Ahmad Bilal Zaidi
profile.bio: Passionate Android developer and computer engineering graduate with experience in Android development, backend, and databases.
profile.aboutDesc: Hey there! I'm a dedicated Android developer, armed with a Bachelor's degree in Computer Engineering. My journey spans across Android development, machine learning, and backend wizardry, complemented by a firm grip on SQL and MongoDB. I'm all about crafting ingenious solutions that push boundaries. Eager to delve deeper into the ever-evolving world of technology, I'm on a quest for innovation and growth. Let's create something extraordinary together!

experience.desc: Assisted with the end-to-end application development process for Stick, an online engagement platform for youth. Worked on database design, backend development, and Android UI, collaborating closely with developers and designers.

education.degree: Bachelor of Technology (B.Tech) in Computer Engineering
education.details: Specialized in Application Development and Machine Learning.

projects.title: Globe Today 2.0
projects.desc: A news application that keeps users up to date with the latest global events. Features smooth navigation, search, bookmarks and a user-friendly interface.

projects.title: Seminar Management System
projects.desc: An Android Jetpack Compose project to streamline seminar book management. Supports fetching, issuing, updating, deleting, and returning books.

projects.title: Image Steganography
projects.desc: An Android-based tool to securely encode secret messages inside images, allowing users to share covert information while keeping communication confidential.

projects.title: Image Encrypt/Decrypt CLI
projects.desc: A simple command-line tool to encrypt and decrypt images, helping users protect sensitive image data through an easy-to-use interface.

projects.title: Dictionary
projects.desc: An end-to-end dictionary project covering both frontend and backend components, allowing users to explore words and their meanings conveniently.

research.title: Transformer-Based Topic Modeling for Research Literature

items.title: AWS Solutions Architect – Associate
items.subtitle: Amazon Web Services (AWS)
items.description: Gained expertise in designing scalable, cost-optimized, fault-tolerant AWS cloud architectures, including VPC, EC2, EBS, RDS, IAM configuration, Auto-Scaling, and high-availability deployment strategies.

documents.title: Resume / CV
documents.desc: B.Tech in Computer Engineering – latest resume.
